posts.post_content:
FS:  T206s - HOFs LaJoie, Bresnahan, McGraw No Cap and (ML) O'Neil.  All graded, see scans.  Proces are shipped, PayPal payment owed or check.  First post, email or PM.  Thanks!

*  Nap LaJoie (Portrait), P150, SGC50 - $400 **Moved to eBay** ** I will still honor this price to Net54 is anyone interested**
*  R Bresnahan (Portrait), SC150, PSA4 - $195 **SOLD**
*  J McGraw (No Cap), P150, PSA4 - $200 **SOLD**
*  W O'Neil, P350, SGC40 - $42 **SOLD**
